revision.text:
{{codepointer|r=Hexen}} '''A_SerpentChooseAttack'''
(''no parameter'')
Does nothing if the target is within melee range. Otherwise, should the calling actor have a Missile state, will jump to the Missile state. This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|Serpent}} and derived classes.
